result.markdown:
--- title: "Geospatial Data Analysis_P2" author: "Fan Jing" format: html execute: eval: true echo: true warning: false freeze: true editor: visual --- # 1. Installing and Launching R Packages ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} pacman::p_load(SmartEDA, tidyverse, ggExtra, ggiraph) ``` ::: # 2 Data Wrangling ## 2.1 Importing the data set In the code chunk below, read_csv() of readr is used to import WDI Country Data.csv into R and parsed it into tibble R data.frame format. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_indicators <- read.csv("WDICountryData.csv") ``` ::: ## 2.2 Data summary Function ExpData() comes from the SmartEDA package in R and The type = 2 argument specifies the type of analysis to perform. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_indicators %>% ExpData(type = 2) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Index Variable_Name Variable_Type Sample_n Missing_Count Per_of_Missing 1 1 Series.Name character 2662 3 0.001 2 2 Series.Code character 2660 5 0.002 3 3 Country.Name character 2660 5 0.002 4 4 Country.Code character 2660 5 0.002 5 5 Region character 2660 5 0.002 6 6 X2000..YR2000. character 2660 5 0.002 7 7 X2001..YR2001. character 2660 5 0.002 8 8 X2002..YR2002. character 2660 5 0.002 9 9 X2003..YR2003. character 2660 5 0.002 10 10 X2004..YR2004. character 2660 5 0.002 11 11 X2005..YR2005. character 2660 5 0.002 12 12 X2006..YR2006. character 2660 5 0.002 13 13 X2007..YR2007. character 2660 5 0.002 14 14 X2008..YR2008. character 2660 5 0.002 15 15 X2009..YR2009. character 2660 5 0.002 16 16 X2010..YR2010. character 2660 5 0.002 17 17 X2011..YR2011. character 2660 5 0.002 18 18 X2012..YR2012. character 2660 5 0.002 19 19 X2013..YR2013. character 2660 5 0.002 20 20 X2014..YR2014. character 2660 5 0.002 21 21 X2015..YR2015. character 2660 5 0.002 22 22 X2016..YR2016. character 2660 5 0.002 23 23 X2017..YR2017. character 2660 5 0.002 24 24 X2018..YR2018. character 2660 5 0.002 25 25 X2019..YR2019. character 2660 5 0.002 26 26 X2020..YR2020. character 2660 5 0.002 27 27 X2021..YR2021. character 2660 5 0.002 No_of_distinct_values 1 13 2 11 3 267 4 267 5 8 6 1856 7 1870 8 1886 9 1886 10 1894 11 1915 12 1940 13 1948 14 1973 15 1980 16 2004 17 2023 18 2041 19 2050 20 2054 21 2047 22 2044 23 2032 24 2008 25 1993 26 1965 27 1945 ``` ::: ::: ## 2.3 Data Cleaning ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_indicators[6:27] <- lapply(water_indicators[6:27], function(x) as.numeric(as.character(x))) ``` ::: Changing column name ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long <- water_indicators %>% pivot_longer( cols = starts_with("X"), names_to = "Year", values_to = "Value" ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long <- water_long %>% mutate(Year = gsub("X(\\d{4})\\.\\..*", "\\1", Year), Year = as.numeric(Year), Value = as.numeric(Value)) ``` ::: First, we will select latest records in 2021 for nine indicator. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected <- water_long %>% filter(Year == 2021) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected[water_long_selected == ".."] <- NA water_long_selected[water_long_selected == "#N/A"] <- NA water_long_selected[water_long_selected == ""] <- NA ``` ::: Next, reshape the data for 2021 and change data type ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape <- water_long_selected %>% select(Country = Country.Name, Region, Variable = Series.Name, Value) %>% pivot_wider(names_from = Variable, values_from = Value) %>% drop_na("Region") ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape$`Population, total` <- as.numeric(gsub(",", "", water_long_selected_reshape$`Population, total`)) ``` ::: # 3. Plot Marginal Density Function ## 3.1 Simple scatterplot between Level of water stress (%) and Water Productivity (US\$ GDP per m続) by region ### 3.1.1 African Region ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_9 <- water_long_selected_reshape %>% select('Country', 'Region',`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`) %>% filter(Region == 'African Region') %>% mutate(Country = as.factor(Country)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_9 <- water_long_selected_reshape_9 %>% drop_na(`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`) %>% mutate( `Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources` = round(as.numeric(`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`), 0), `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)` = round(as.numeric(`Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`), 0) ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p1 <- ggplot(data = water_long_selected_reshape_9, aes(x = `Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, y = `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`, color = Country)) + geom_point_interactive(aes( tooltip = Country))+ coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0, 140), ylim = c(0, 140)) + labs(x = "Level of water stress (%)", y = "Water Productivity (US$ GDP per m続)", color = "Country Name") p1 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Geospatial-Data-Analysis_P2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} girafe(ggobj = p1) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 3.1.2 European Region ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_10 <- water_long_selected_reshape %>% select('Country', 'Region',`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`) %>% filter(Region == 'European Region') %>% mutate(Country = as.factor(Country)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_10 <- water_long_selected_reshape_10 %>% drop_na(`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`) %>% mutate( `Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources` = round(as.numeric(`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`), 0), `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)` = round(as.numeric(`Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`), 0) ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p2 <- ggplot(data = water_long_selected_reshape_10, aes(x = `Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, y = `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`, color = Country)) + geom_point_interactive(aes( tooltip = Country))+ coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0, 140), ylim = c(0, 140)) + labs(x = "Level of water stress (%)", y = "Water Productivity (US$ GDP per m続)", color = "Country Name") p2 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Geospatial-Data-Analysis_P2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} girafe(ggobj = p2) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 3.1.3 Western Pacific Region ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_11 <- water_long_selected_reshape %>% select('Country', 'Region',`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`) %>% filter(Region == 'Western Pacific Region') %>% mutate(Country = as.factor(Country)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_11 <- water_long_selected_reshape_11 %>% drop_na(`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`) %>% mutate( `Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources` = round(as.numeric(`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`), 0), `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)` = round(as.numeric(`Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`), 0) ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p3 <- ggplot(data = water_long_selected_reshape_11, aes(x = `Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, y = `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`, color = Country)) + geom_point_interactive(aes( tooltip = Country))+ coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0, 140), ylim = c(0, 140)) + labs(x = "Level of water stress (%)", y = "Water Productivity (US$ GDP per m続)", color = "Country Name") p3 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Geospatial-Data-Analysis_P2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-21-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} girafe(ggobj = p3) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 3.1.4 Eastern Mediterranean Region ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_12 <- water_long_selected_reshape %>% select('Country', 'Region',`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`) %>% filter(Region == 'Eastern Mediterranean Region') %>% mutate(Country = as.factor(Country)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_12 <- water_long_selected_reshape_12 %>% drop_na(`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`) %>% mutate( `Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources` = round(as.numeric(`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`), 0), `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)` = round(as.numeric(`Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`), 0) ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p4 <- ggplot(data = water_long_selected_reshape_12, aes(x = `Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, y = `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`, color = Country)) + geom_point_interactive(aes( tooltip = Country))+ coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0, 140), ylim = c(0, 140)) + labs(x = "Level of water stress (%)", y = "Water Productivity (US$ GDP per m続)", color = "Country Name") p4 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Geospatial-Data-Analysis_P2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-25-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} girafe(ggobj = p4) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 3.1.5 South-East Asia Region ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_13 <- water_long_selected_reshape %>% select('Country', 'Region',`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`) %>% filter(Region == 'South-East Asia Region') %>% mutate(Country = as.factor(Country)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_13 <- water_long_selected_reshape_13 %>% drop_na(`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`) %>% mutate( `Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources` = round(as.numeric(`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`), 0), `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)` = round(as.numeric(`Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`), 0) ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p5 <- ggplot(data = water_long_selected_reshape_13, aes(x = `Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, y = `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`, color = Country)) + geom_point_interactive(aes( tooltip = Country))+ coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0, 140), ylim = c(0, 140)) + labs(x = "Level of water stress (%)", y = "Water Productivity (US$ GDP per m続)", color = "Country Name") p5 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Geospatial-Data-Analysis_P2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-29-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} girafe(ggobj = p5) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 3.1.6 Region of the Americas ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_14 <- water_long_selected_reshape %>% select('Country', 'Region',`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`) %>% filter(Region == 'Region of the Americas') %>% mutate(Country = as.factor(Country)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_14 <- water_long_selected_reshape_14 %>% drop_na(`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`) %>% mutate( `Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources` = round(as.numeric(`Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`), 0), `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)` = round(as.numeric(`Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`), 0) ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p6 <- ggplot(data = water_long_selected_reshape_14, aes(x = `Level of water stress: freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources`, y = `Water productivity, total (constant 2015 US$ GDP per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal)`, color = Country)) + geom_point_interactive(aes( tooltip = Country))+ coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0, 140), ylim = c(0, 140)) + labs(x = "Level of water stress (%)", y = "Water Productivity (US$ GDP per m続)", color = "Country Name") p6 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Geospatial-Data-Analysis_P2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-33-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} girafe(ggobj = p6) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## 3.2 Simple scatterplot between basic drinking water services (%) and safely managed drinking water services (%) by region ### 3.2.1 African Region ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_15 <- water_long_selected_reshape %>% select('Country', 'Region',`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`) %>% filter(Region == 'African Region') %>% mutate(Country = as.factor(Country)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_15 <- water_long_selected_reshape_15 %>% drop_na(`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`) %>% mutate( `People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`), 0), `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`), 0) ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p7 <- ggplot(data = water_long_selected_reshape_15, aes(x = `People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, y = `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`, color = Country)) + geom_point_interactive(aes( tooltip = Country))+ coord_cartesian(xlim = c(30, 100), ylim = c(5, 100)) + labs(x = "Basic drinking water services (%)", y = "safely managed drinking water services", color = "Country Name") p7 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Geospatial-Data-Analysis_P2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-37-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} girafe(ggobj = p7) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 3.2.2 European Region ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_16 <- water_long_selected_reshape %>% select('Country', 'Region',`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`) %>% filter(Region == 'European Region') %>% mutate(Country = as.factor(Country)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_16 <- water_long_selected_reshape_16 %>% drop_na(`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`) %>% mutate( `People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`), 0), `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`), 0) ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p8 <- ggplot(data = water_long_selected_reshape_16, aes(x = `People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, y = `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`, color = Country)) + geom_point_interactive(aes( tooltip = Country))+ coord_cartesian(xlim = c(30, 100), ylim = c(5, 100)) + labs(x = "Basic drinking water services (%)", y = "safely managed drinking water services", color = "Country Name") p8 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Geospatial-Data-Analysis_P2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-41-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} girafe(ggobj = p8) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 3.2.3 Western Pacific Region ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_17 <- water_long_selected_reshape %>% select('Country', 'Region',`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`) %>% filter(Region == 'European Region') %>% mutate(Country = as.factor(Country)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_17 <- water_long_selected_reshape_17 %>% drop_na(`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`) %>% mutate( `People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`), 0), `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`), 0) ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p9 <- ggplot(data = water_long_selected_reshape_17, aes(x = `People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, y = `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`, color = Country)) + geom_point_interactive(aes( tooltip = Country))+ coord_cartesian(xlim = c(30, 100), ylim = c(5, 100)) + labs(x = "Basic drinking water services (%)", y = "safely managed drinking water services", color = "Country Name") p9 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Geospatial-Data-Analysis_P2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-45-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} girafe(ggobj = p9) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 3.2.4 Eastern Mediterranean Region ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_18 <- water_long_selected_reshape %>% select('Country', 'Region',`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`) %>% filter(Region == 'Eastern Mediterranean Region') %>% mutate(Country = as.factor(Country)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_18 <- water_long_selected_reshape_18 %>% drop_na(`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`) %>% mutate( `People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`), 0), `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`), 0) ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p10 <- ggplot(data = water_long_selected_reshape_18, aes(x = `People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, y = `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`, color = Country)) + geom_point_interactive(aes( tooltip = Country))+ coord_cartesian(xlim = c(30, 100), ylim = c(5, 100)) + labs(x = "Basic drinking water services (%)", y = "safely managed drinking water services", color = "Country Name") p10 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Geospatial-Data-Analysis_P2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-49-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} girafe(ggobj = p10) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 3.2.5 South-East Asia Region ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_19 <- water_long_selected_reshape %>% select('Country', 'Region',`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`) %>% filter(Region == 'South-East Asia Region') %>% mutate(Country = as.factor(Country)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_19 <- water_long_selected_reshape_19 %>% drop_na(`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`) %>% mutate( `People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`), 0), `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`), 0) ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p11 <- ggplot(data = water_long_selected_reshape_19, aes(x = `People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, y = `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`, color = Country)) + geom_point_interactive(aes( tooltip = Country))+ coord_cartesian(xlim = c(30, 100), ylim = c(5, 100)) + labs(x = "Basic drinking water services (%)", y = "safely managed drinking water services", color = "Country Name") p11 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Geospatial-Data-Analysis_P2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-53-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} girafe(ggobj = p11) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 3.2.6 Region of the Americas ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_20 <- water_long_selected_reshape %>% select('Country', 'Region',`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`) %>% filter(Region == 'Region of the Americas') %>% mutate(Country = as.factor(Country)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_20 <- water_long_selected_reshape_20 %>% drop_na(`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`) %>% mutate( `People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`), 0), `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`), 0) ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p12 <- ggplot(data = water_long_selected_reshape_20, aes(x = `People using at least basic drinking water services (% of population)`, y = `People using safely managed drinking water services (% of population)`, color = Country)) + geom_point_interactive(aes( tooltip = Country))+ coord_cartesian(xlim = c(30, 100), ylim = c(5, 100)) + labs(x = "Basic drinking water services (%)", y = "safely managed drinking water services", color = "Country Name") p12 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Geospatial-Data-Analysis_P2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-57-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} girafe(ggobj = p12) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## 3.3 Simple scatterplot between basic sanitation services (% of population) and safely managed sanitation services (% of population) ### 3.3.1 African Region ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_21 <- water_long_selected_reshape %>% select('Country', 'Region',`People using at least basic sanitation services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed sanitation services (% of population)`) %>% filter(Region == 'African Region') %>% mutate(Country = as.factor(Country)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} water_long_selected_reshape_21 <- water_long_selected_reshape_21 %>% drop_na(`People using at least basic sanitation services (% of population)`, `People using safely managed sanitation services (% of population)`) %>% mutate( `People using at least basic sanitation services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using at least basic sanitation services (% of population)`), 0), `People using safely managed sanitation services (% of population)` = round(as.numeric(`People using safely managed sanitation services (% of population)`), 0) ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p13 <- ggplot(data = water_long_selected_reshape_21, aes(x = `People using at least basic sanitation services (% of population)`, y = `People using safely managed sanitation services (% of population)`, color = Country)) + geom_point_interactive(aes( tooltip = Country))+ coord_cartesian(xlim = c(5, 100), ylim = c(0, 100)) + labs(x = "Basic sanitation services (%)", y = "safely managed sanitation services (%)", color = "Country Name") p13 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Geospatial-Data-Analysis_P2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-61-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} girafe(ggobj = p13) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
